.Welcome to STOPOHOLIC.

A ‘STOP’ that keeps you away from Relapsing.

In 2020-21, alcohol is the most common drug of concern in Australia. There is an overall increase in the number of alcohol-related treatments from 67,400 in 2011 to 83,600 in 2021.
